name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do I Sound Like a Nazi?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Muslim' with 'Jew' so you can see if what you're reading sounds nazi-ish.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension replaces the text 'Muslim' with 'Jew' so you can decide whether or not what you're reading about Muslims sounds like something a Nazi would have said about Jews.
